td.span:
Ph.D. Candidate
Department of Computer Science
University of Kentucky
Lexington, KY 40506
Email: yzh355 AT g.uky.edu
Phone: (859)693-2220

p.span: My research interests include Software Testing, Natural Language Processing, Deep/Reinforcement Learning, Computer Networks, Wireless Sensor Network, Indoor localization.
I am under the supervision of Dr. Tingting Yu and Dr. Chen Qian. Here is my CV. [pdf]
